selected_quotes: There's a journal called Physical Chemistry Chemical Physics #amusingjournaltitles

citation.abstract: Using ab initio evolutionary simulations, we explore the entire range of possible stoichiometries for the Mg-O system at pressures of up to 850 GPa. In addition to MgO, our calculations find that two extraordinary compounds MgO2 and Mg3O2 become thermodynamically stable at 116 GPa and 500 GPa, respectively. Detailed chemical bonding analysis shows large charge transfer in all magnesium oxides. MgO2 contains peroxide ions [O-O](2-), while non-nuclear electron density maxima play the role of anions in the electride compound Mg3O2. The latter compound is calculated to have a much narrower band gap compared to MgO and MgO2. We discuss the conditions under which MgO2 and Mg3O2 could exist in planetary interiors.
citation.title: Novel stable compounds in the Mg–O system under high pressure

wikipedia.title: Magnesium peroxide
wikipedia.summary: Magnesium peroxide (MgO2) is an odorless fine powder peroxide with a white to off-white color.

wikipedia.title: Magnesium oxide
wikipedia.summary: Magnesium oxide (MgO), or magnesia, is a white hygroscopic solid mineral that occurs naturally as periclase and is a source of magnesium (see also oxide).

author.name: Martin Kolarov
author.description: Chemistry student, graduate student, soccer fanatic and a dreamer. I tweet quotes now and then. Trying to keep it simple.

news.title: Against Chemical Intuition: Na 3 Cl and NaCl 3 Do Exist
news.summary: Sodium chlorides with unusual stoichiometries exist at high pressures

blogs.title: Are planets made of ‘totally unexpected’ stuff?
blogs.summary: STONY BROOK (US) — Researchers have made a surprising prediction about one of the main materials inside planets.They calculate that magnesium oxide (MgO) can exist in several different compositions. The predicted compounds would be radically different from
